name: Temples (Dziek)
description:
A shooter game where you move on a grid and can only shoot one block ahead. (May take awhile to load even when the bar is full).

---

This game was created in about a week as part of a Game a Month challenge (profile here). It was also used as a chance to mess with WebGL in Unity. Still, I might expand it, so if anyone has any feedback let me know on Twitter @DziekDB or through skywriting or whatever.
